content-EN.title: Interactive Implementation: Fitlody
content-EN.content: Problem statement: Motivation is one of the most limitation of people doing exercises. We want to combined “exercise” with “music creation”

content-EN.title: Web-based Game: Infinite Travel
content-EN.content: Problem statement: We have got APIs from Picture Queensland Database containing old pictures of Queensland, how to design an interactive system to introduce these buried treasure to our audience?

content-EN.title: Mobile-App Design: Pillow
content-EN.content: Problem statement: Study shows that 70% of the people couldn’t get enough sleep, this situation is even severer among the college students. Our team will study the reasons and factors that cause this phenomenon, and come up with some design to help improve this situation.

content-CN.title: 交互式项目：运·律
content-CN.content: 当今社会下的人们常常发现自己没有进行运动的动力，我们希望能够结合运动和音乐创作，用创造和反馈来让运动变得更友好，更有活力。

content-CN.title: 网络小游戏：回到过去
content-CN.content: 我们有来自州立图书馆的数据，如何利用这些数据设计出一个知识性的网站，让大家能够在游戏中获得知识。

content-CN.title: 移动端应用：枕·梦
content-CN.content: 研究证明有70%的人存在睡眠障碍问题，这个现象在大学生中尤甚。我们会研究造成这一现象的各种因素，然后设计出一个系统来改善这种现象。

content-CN.title: 一些平面设计
content-CN.content: 一些冷知识！/ 复古小镇
